channel.title: Javascript on Keep Moving
channel.description: Recent content in Javascript on Keep Moving

item.title: [Mac] ijavascript 설치
item.description: ruby -e "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install)" brew install pkg-config node zeromq sudo easy_install pip sudo pip install --upgrade pyzmq jupyter sudo npm install -g ijavascript 설치하고자 하는 가상환경에서 ijsinstall ijsnotebook으로 실행
